document.full_text: wilton wynn, one of the deans of foreign correspondents in the post-world war two era and a towering figure of american journalism in the 20th century, died thursday. he was 91.
document.title: wilton wynn, dean of foreign correspondents, dies
lines_and_colors: wilton wynn, one of the deans of foreign correspondents in the post-world war two era and a towering figure of american journalism in the 20th century, died thursday. he was 91.
